sentence: the text of the {string} element should be exactly {string}
description: This assertion checks if the element's visible text is an exact match to the specified string.

variables.name: name
variables.description: The logical name of the element to check.

variables.name: expectedText
variables.description: The exact text that should be contained.

gherkinExample: Then the text of the "Welcome Message" element should be exactly "Hello John".
